## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6462180066b4c25e184d616993e44ba94d6e6fdf065db3e0e6ce52a1015a0aa0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@depro0x/despicable-me' @ 8.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
